name: Jumping ball (BlackBirdGames)
description:
"jumping ball" is a casual fun Game where you break your own score.

You have to jump as often as possible and avoid the birds if you meet a bird you are out

Control:  Click on the big " JUMP" Icon with the left mouse button and you jump quckly and easily 

I would be very grateful for a small donation for the work

but donating is of course voluntary  😃
